Package com.cscie97.store.controller

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscie97.store.controller.CommandFactory
  • public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the factory design pattern. It generates the appropriate command and adds it to the queue to process later. When the invoke commands command gets called, the commands in the queue execute in chunks. The client is sent a confirmation that the request is getting processed right away
    Author:
    Tofik Mussa
